effect.x_y: Lowers all targets’ Attack and Special Attack by one stage. Makes the user switch out.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Lowers all targets’ Attack and Special Attack by one stage. Makes the user switch out.

short_effect.x_y: Lowers all targets’ Attack and Special Attack by one stage. Makes the user switch out.
short_effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Lowers all targets’ Attack and Special Attack by one stage. Makes the user switch out.

flavor_text.x_y: With a parting threat, the user lowers the target’s Attack and Sp. Atk stats. Then it switches with a party Pokémon.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: With a parting threat, the user lowers the target’s Attack and Sp. Atk stats. Then it switches with a party Pokémon.
